panels.title: Total requests in the selected period

targets.expr:
round(
  (
    sum by (service) (ruby_puma_max_threads{service="$web_service"}) -
    sum by (service) (ruby_puma_thread_pool_capacity{service="$web_service"})
  ) /
  sum by (service) (ruby_puma_max_threads{service="$web_service"})
  * 100
)

round(
  (
    sum by (service) (ruby_puma_max_threads{service="$integrations_service"}) -
    sum by (service) (ruby_puma_thread_pool_capacity{service="$integrations_service"})
  ) /
  sum by (service) (ruby_puma_max_threads{service="$integrations_service"})
  * 100
)
